view1: When did you start 100 days of code? YYYY-MM-DD, include leading 0's.
view2: Click the link to copy the important code to your clipboard and open your twitter search.
When twitter opens, scroll all the way down until all tweets are loaded.

Open the browser console
  • On Windows and Linux: Ctrl + Shift + J
  • On Mac: Cmd + Option + J
Press paste to put the code in the console
Press enter to run the code. This code with automatically copy the screennames of the participants to your clipboard.
view3: Paste in the usernames that have been automatically copied to your clipboard.
view4: Click the link which will automatically copy the important code to your clipboard and open your twitter search.
When twitter opens, scroll all the way down until all tweets are loaded.
Open the browser console (On Windows and Linux: Ctrl + Shift + J. On Mac: Cmd + Option + J.)
Press paste to put the code in the console
Press enter to run the code. This code with automatically copy the screennames of the participants to your clipboard.
view5: Paste in the usernames that have been automatically copied to your clipboard.
view6: Encourage your fellow partipants, by tweeting at them!
